revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Mistral |model=Craneboard |revision=(rev B) |manuf_country=India |is_manuf=No |manuf=Mistral Solutions |manuf_model=MS_CB_B_0444 |price=200 |est_release_date=12/2010 |type=single-board computer, development board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=AM3517 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F2G16AAD |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H64M16HR-25E:H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, J3 |serial=yes,, console port (DE-9),, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN8720A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=3V RS232 Transceiver;TI;MB3232I;;1;,,, Isolated 5V CAN Transceiver;TI;ISO1050;;1;,,, USB 2.0 ULPI Transceiver;SMSC;USB3320;;1;,,, Adjustable LDO and 5V Switch with Dual Current Pimit;TI;TPS2141;;1;,,, 0.5A Current-Limited, Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2052;;1;,,, 24-bit Low-Voltage FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CB3Q16211;;2;,,, 10-bit Low-Voltage FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CB3Q3384A;;2;,,, Flat-panel Display Digital Transmitter;TI;TFP410PAP;;1;,,, 100V 802.3af PoE-PD DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23750;;1;,,, Integrated Power Management IC;TI;TPS65910A1;;1;,,, 1.5A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;TI;TPS78601;;1;,,, 2.2A Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2024;;1;,,, 2.2A Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2034;;1; |flags=DVI-D, SDHC, CAN Bus, Component Video, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.11; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=none |oui_eth=08:00:28 }} {{TagLine|CraneBoard Development Board}} :[https://www.mistralsolutions.com/product-engineering-services/products/development-platforms/craneboard/ Product page]
The board can be powered by 3 different methods: *5V/2A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Micro-B *PoE (802.3af)
DVI-D output {{See also|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[TI]]'' AM3517 @600MHz :ARM (Cortex-A8) SoC *GPU: PowerVR SGX *RAM: 256MB DDR2 *Storage: 256MB NAND
===Links=== *[https://processors.wiki.ti.com/index.php/CraneBoard ''CraneBoard'' on '''TI Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2011/09/28/craneboard-low-cost-development-board-based-on-ti-am3517/ ''CraneBoard: Low Cost Development Board'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://linuxdevices.org/craneboard-opens-up-industrial-cortex-a8-soc-to-developers/ ''CraneBoard opens up industrial Cortex-A8 SoC'' on '''LinuxDevices''']
__NOTOC__
